marklogic.body:
Cameron isn't stupid but, alas, he dedicates his intelligence to being in the middle of the herd. Worse, his frame of reference is limited to metropolitan liberals like himself.
It is too late for him to be sound on Europe, climate change or spending. In the past he has got himself out of tight Spots by sounding like a Conservative. Now, however, we have heard it too often and realise it is only an and that he reverts to being a LibDem as soon as the pressure is Off.
We need a new leader of the Conservative Party. Cameron should stay on as PM for as long as the coalition lasts but he should not lead the party (as distinct from the government) into the next general election.
